xml.data:
Home » 16A5 Pañcakanipātapāḷi » 5 Pañcamapaṇṇāsaka » 5.1 Kimilavagga
5.1.10 Muṭṭhassatisutta
Pañcamapaṇṇāsaka
Kimilavagga
Muṭṭhassatisutta
210.
1215“Pañcime, bhikkhave, ādīnavā muṭṭhassatissa asampajānassa niddaṃ okkamayato. Katame pañca? Dukkhaṃ supati, dukkhaṃ paṭibujjhati, pāpakaṃ supinaṃ passati, devatā na rakkhanti, asuci muccati. Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ādīnavā muṭṭhassatissa asampajānassa niddaṃ okkamayato.
1216Pañcime, bhikkhave, ānisaṃsā upaṭṭhitassatissa sampajānassa niddaṃ okkamayato. Katame pañca? Sukhaṃ supati, sukhaṃ paṭibujjhati, na pāpakaṃ supinaṃ passati, devatā rakkhanti, asuci na muccati. Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ānisaṃsā upaṭṭhitassatissa sampajānassa niddaṃ okkamayato”ti.
1217Dasamaṃ.
1218Kimilavaggo paṭhamo.
1219Tassuddānaṃ
1220
Kimilo dhammassavanaṃ,
ājānīyo balaṃ khilaṃ;
Vinibandhaṃ yāgu kaṭṭhaṃ,
gītaṃ muṭṭhassatinā cāti.
<< 5.1.9 Gītassarasuttaup5.2 Akkosakavagga >>
